content: --गत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} existing or passing in the mind, concealed in the breast, internal, inward, secret; नेयं न वक्ष्यति मनोगतमाधिहेतुं <ls>Ś. 3. 11.</ls> {2} affecting the mind, desired. (--तं {1} a wish, desired; मनोगतं सा न शशाक शंसितुं <ls>Ku. 5. 51.</ls> {2} an idea, thought, notion, opinion.
